item.title: How to strong name partially signed assemblies
item.description: When developing software based on .NET it is quite common to strong name your assemblies especially if youâ€™re a library vendor providing your libraries to other people.

item.title: PowerShell Community Extensions
item.description: I started the PowerShell Community Extensions (PSCX) project to fill in some of the gaps in the set of built-in Windows PowerShell commands.
